_comment: The possible paywall values are 'meter' (wall after 5), 'paywall' (wall immediately), or 'free' (no wall)

PROJECT._comment: IMPORTANT: SUBFOLDER and SLUG for used for file pathing and the deploy script! Take care with your edits to them! NOTE: Stage deploys will automatically go to 'test-proj'
PROJECT.SEO_TITLE: Earthquake Tracker: The latest quakes in California and across the world
PROJECT.SOCIAL_TITLE: Earthquake Tracker: The latest quakes in California and across the world in real time
PROJECT.DESCRIPTION: See significant earthquakes that have occurred in the past 30 days in real time, focusing on epicenters in California.
PROJECT.TWITTER_TEXT: Earthquake Tracker: See the latest quakes in California and across the world in real time
